text: Godɨn Averpenimɨn eghaghanir kam, a bizir datɨrɨghɨn e bativamibar ababanim gami. Averpenir kamɨn aven, me asɨziba ko bizir guar bar avɨrir aghuiba ofabar mɨn God ganɨga egha an ziam fe. Ezɨ bizir kaba bar gumazir Godɨn ziam febar navir averiatam akɨrɨghan kogham, eghtɨ me kamaghɨn fogh suam, me arazir kuraba puvatɨ. Bar puvatɨ.
